text:
Today we're learning English with 
Disney Pixar's newest animation Luca!

This movie is set in the beautiful 
Italian Riviera and tells the story

of the curious and enthusiastic Luca, who like 
any other child is eager to explore the world.

If you haven't seen this movie don't worry 
because the two scenes that we have selected

for today's lesson contain no spoilers!
If you want to keep learning with the best

movies and TV series, so that you can finally 
watch them without getting lost, without missing

the jokes and without subtitles make sure you hit 
that Subscribe button and the Bell down below.

So that you can experience 
something similar to Ahmed,

who actually recommended our channel 
to more than 50 of his friends

who all subscribed and are having a positive 
change to their English language learning.

If you want to keep on improving your 
listening with natural conversations

then you have to download the RealLife English 
App. You can listen to our podcast and follow

along with the transcript as well as 
have short conversations with other

English learners from all around the world!
It's what you need to become a fluent speaker.

The best part is is that it's available to you 
right now at the touch of a button for FREE.

That's right, absolutely free!
All you have to do is visit

the Google Play or the Apple App Store and 
search RealLife English to download it now.

You can also click up here or 
down in the description box below.

I hope you've enjoyed learning with Luca 
so far today. Don't forget to check out our

Disney playlist, which is designed for you to 
keep on learning with your favorite animations.

You can also make sure you visit our 
Instagram @reallife.english that you can

continue learning with us every single day!
So now you're going to watch again without

subtitles and participate 
in a fun quiz. Good luck!
